long_description: He'll love the easy lacing, cushioned liners and soft flex of the the Burton Zipline all-mountain snowboard boots. They're made for young shredders looking to take their boarding to the next level. Lightning-fast Speed Dial lacing system offers easy lacing-simply twist dial to tighten or loosen laces. Micro-adjustable Speed Dial system saves time by remaining fully enaged when cranking or loosening; exit is easy with a quick pull of the dial top loop. Imprint liners with long-lasting fit panels conform to feet after a few days of riding and feature integrated lacing. Molded EVA footbeds enhance arch support, improve response and absorb shock. DynoLite outsoles are soft-flexing for enhanced balance when riding and hiking; ice spikes take hold on ice and snow.
short_description: He'll love the easy lacing, cushioned liners and soft flex of the the Burton Zipline all-mountain snowboard boots. They're made for young shredders looking to take their boarding to the next level.
